name: MLstate
tag_list: webservice, webapps, database, language, programming, compiler
overview:
MLstate has researched and developed a breakthrough in web application development and runtime: OPA. OPA is a completely new webservice stack, comprising new language, database, server and framework. By respecting web standards, OPA is fully compatible with existing browsers and services.

OPA changes so much in web technology that it can be presented in many ways. Its unique, strong security is the ”can opener” that convinces users to shift to OPA and benefit at the same time of lower application development costs, easier maintenance and better performance.

OPA was finalist of Paris Innovation Grand Prix in 2007, cited in â€™Best Of â€™ Atelier BNP Paribas in 2008 and won the contest of French Ministry of Research 2008. MLstate is a member of W3C and won the Web 2.0 Project Call of the French Ministry of Industry in 2009.
